errors.codesOfAvailableCurrenciesRetrievingFail: The malfunction has occurred during the retrieving of codes of available currencies. If you are going to upload the data from excel please try to retrieve this data again.
errors.tableDataRetrievingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during the table data retrieving.
errors.excelDataParsingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during the reading of Excel file.
errors.importedFromExcelDataSubmittingError: The malfunction has occurred during uploading of data import from the Excel file.

invalidDataInputtingPrevention.yearAndMonthOfActualityStartingIsLaterTh: Unable to update actuality staring year or month because specified value is later than year and month of actuality ending.
invalidDataInputtingPrevention.yearAndMonthOfActualityEndingIsEarlierTh: Unable to update actuality ending year or month because specified value is earlier than year and month of actuality starting.

excelFileValidation.intro: The following violations has been detected in exported Excel file:
excelFileValidation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-NOT_EXISTS: The business cost item ID is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STR: The business cost item ID has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
excelFileValidation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-STRING_BUT_EMPTY: The business cost item ID has been specified with string, but this string is empty.
excelFileValidation.BUSINESS_COST_ITEM_ID-HAS_DUPLICATE: It the subsequent occurrence in this file of item with same ID.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-NOT_EXISTS: The business cost item starting year/month is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STRIN: The business cost item starting year/month has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-DISALLOWED_CHARACTER: Specified starting year/month including the non-digits characters, while must be the digits sequence like "202509" representing the 4-digits year and 2-digits month.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-WRONG_DIGITS_AT_SPEC: Although specified starting year/month consists from digits, this digits sequence does not represent the valid year and month combination.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-YEAR_IS_EARLIER_THAN: Specified starting year is earlier than {{ earliestYear }}, the earliest allowed year.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-YEAR_IS_LATER_THAN_L: Specified starting year is later than {{ latestYear }}, the latest allowed year.
excelFileValidation.STARTING_YEAR_MONTH-INVALID_MONTH_NUMBER: Invalid number of starting month. Please specify the 2-digits sequence from 01 to 12.
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STRING: The business cost item ending year/month has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-DISALLOWED_CHARACTERS: Specified ending year/month including the non-digits characters, while must be the digits sequence like "202509" representing the 4-digits year and 2-digits month.
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-WRONG_DIGITS_AT_SPECIF: Although specified ending year/month consists from digits, this digits sequence does not represent the valid year and month combination.
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-YEAR_IS_EARLIER_THAN_E: Specified ending year is earlier than {{ earliestYear }}, the earliest allowed year.
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-YEAR_IS_LATER_THAN_LAT: Specified ending year is later than {{ latestYear }}, the latest allowed year.
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-INVALID_MONTH_NUMBER: Invalid number of ending month. Please specify the 2-digits sequence from 01 to 12.
excelFileValidation.ENDING_YEAR_MONTH-EARLIER_THAN_STARTING_: The specified ending year and month combination is earlier that starting year and month.
excelFileValidation.CURRENCY_ID-NOT_EXISTS: Currency code is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.CURRENCY_ID-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_STRING: Currency code has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
excelFileValidation.CURRENCY_ID-DISALLOWED_VARIANT: Specified currency code is not allowed. Please specify one of the following currency codes: {{ commaSeparatedAllowedVariants }}.
excelFileValidation.AMOUNT_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Amount validity flag　is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.AMOUNT_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BOOLEAN: Amount validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
excelFileValidation.RATE_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Rate validity flag　is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.RATE_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BOOLEAN: Rate validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
excelFileValidation.CALC_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Calculation validity flag　is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.CALC_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BOOLEAN: Calculation validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.
excelFileValidation.AUTO_CREATE_VALID_FLAG-NOT_EXISTS: Auto creating validity flag　is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.AUTO_CREATE_VALID_FLAG-EXISTS_BUT_NOT_BO: Auto creating validity flag has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a boolean.

checkingForDuplications.intro: There are the items with even cost price code and currency code combination. To save the data, these duplications must be resolved.
checkingForDuplications.row: Cost Price Item Code：{{ businessUnitCostPriceItemLocalizedName }}, Corrency Codee：{{ currencyCode }}
